name: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
title: Tiny changes, remarkable results
description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones through small, incremental changes.

name: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
author: Stephen Covey
title: Powerful lessons in personal change
description: A holistic approach to effectiveness in attaining goals through aligning oneself with universal principles.

name: Think and Grow Rich
author: Napoleon Hill
title: The classic guide to success
description: The timeless classic that reveals the secret to financial independence and personal achievement.

name: How to Win Friends and Influence People
author: Dale Carnegie
title: Master the art of influence
description: Practical advice on how to make people like you, win people over, and change behavior without arousing resentment.

name: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
title: A guide to spiritual enlightenment
description: A transformative book on the importance of living in the present moment and finding peace.

name: Can't Hurt Me
author: David Goggins
title: Master your mind and defy the odds
description: An inspirational memoir about overcoming obstacles and pushing beyond perceived limits.
